decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Other than when in use, any cycle(s) shall be stored at all times within the unit's internal storage area detailed on Drawing No. 1910.03 (Proposed Floor Plans).

REASON: To ensure that cycle parking arrangements are acceptable, and to ensure the development does not adversely impact upon the flow and safety of pedestrians along the highway, in accordance with Policy T4 of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.R of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM42 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 2 - Bins shall be stored at all times within the service road immediately to the rear of the site.

REASON: To ensure the development does not adversely impact upon the flow and safety of pedestrians along the highway, in accordance with Policy T4 of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.R of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM42 and DM44 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 3 - Prior to the occupation of the new unit hereby permitted, details of sound insulation in the form of cross section drawing(s) between the ceiling of the ground floor commercial premises directly below and the flooring of the proposed residential unit shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  The new units hereby permitted shall not be occupied until sound insulation has been installed in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained. 

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of prospective residents in accordance with Policy D3 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Change of use from Office  (Class E) To 1 Self-Contained Flat (Class C3) on first floor; (Prior Approval Of Transport & Highways Impacts Of The Development, Contamination Risks And Flooding Risks On The Site, and Impacts Of Noise From Commercial Premises On The Intended Occupiers Of The Development and provision of natural light in all habitable rooms)
